title: Do low level inactive accounts get deleted at the end of the year?
body: I've been wondering because i wanted this name. If you know pls help me out, i'd be thankful to know the answer.

replies.body: [This page should have the information you're looking for!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)
So not only are you forcing us to use boards, you decided to make riot support look like ass as well, Yay.

No.

But they get a free name change to random letters and numbers.
